name: Redbrick, a mid 90's visual prototype
description:
Oi this only runs on Chromium browsers, sorry!

This is my first 3d first-person prototype. I learned how to use meshes, textures, lighting and audio in Godot.

The visuals are inspired by The Elder Scrolls: Arena, but there are some violations such as the ability to look up and down, and a higher framerate.

There isn't any gameplay, it's just of a tech prototype 🙂
